description: 9 weekly multiple-choice quizzes assessing lecture and practical content understanding. Each quiz takes 10 minutes with online feedback.

Group-based field research project involving hypothesis formulation, data collection, analysis, and communication. Includes a research proposal presentation (10%), individual scientific journal-style report (1500 words, 20%), and final group presentation (5%).
Individual popular science article (800 words) arguing one side of a contentious marine science topic, followed by debate participation. Focuses on conservation and management issues.
2-hour final examination with multiple-choice and short essay questions covering all course material (lectures and practicals).
